title: Nurse Practitioner Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Elliot Health System in Feb 2023
Interview Descriptions: Fair interview with HR. The discussion went well and I was able to ask a lot of questions that I had listed previously. They were also fair with the questions that were asked about my experience.
Interview Questions: Describe your past experience over the past 5 years.

title: Patient Service Representative Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Elliot Health System
Interview Descriptions: Over the phone interview went well, but no follow up after it was promised that I would be an in-person interview.  When I followed up they told me the job was filled.
Interview Questions: About past jobs and what was my job functions

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Elliot Health System
Interview Descriptions: Positive interview, manager was very attentive and engaged. Everyone encountered from the front desk to the department was pleasant. Offered pay and benefits package lesser than similar positions in the area.

title: Team Lead Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Elliot Health System in Nov 2020
Interview Descriptions:
I submitted a resume online and was contacted by HR. My resume was submitted to the hiring manager for this particular position. This led to an in person interview with multiple senior staff. This was
 followed by multiple reference checks,  a background check,  and education verification.
Interview Questions: Are you an independent worker or do you work best in a team environment?

title: Fitness Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Elliot Health System
Interview Descriptions: I applied while I was finishing up my bachelor's degree in exercise science and HR was flexible when scheduling my interview due to the fact I was still in school. After my interview, I was called a week later and offered a position.  The people who interviewed me were kind and interested in what I had to say.
Interview Questions:
Tell us a bit about yourself.
Why Elliot Health System?
Is there a time you felt uncomfortable at work? If so, what did you do?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 8 weeks. I interviewed at Elliot Health System (Manchester, NH) in Nov 2019
Interview Descriptions:
Lack of formality. The management team wasn’t expecting me or maybe they have no clue about how to prepare for an interview with a new candidate.
I wait for one hour and a half before they show up for the interview appointment
Interview Questions:
Tell me about your self?
Your availability? Flexibility?
Salary expectations?

title: APRN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Elliot Health System in Apr 2019
Interview Descriptions:
short, have been an employee at this company for many years. really do not have much else to say. the interview was quick
friendly 
don't really have much else to say this is a long review
Interview Questions: why would you like this job

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Elliot Health System
Interview Descriptions:
Filled out application online. Received email for interview. T
Set up interview only by email. No phone calls made. Interview 2 weeks later. Interview was with human resources. Typical questions. Then done. Waited 2 weeks for email or phone call for second interview.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years

title: Patient Service Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Elliot Health System (Manchester, NH) in Jan 2018
Interview Descriptions: The hiring process was easy. Started with HR, than moved onto the manager of the practice. Then back to HR. Then they contact compensation and try to get you a wage and then hire you over the phone / email
Interview Questions: what did you do in your previous jobs?

title: Phlebotomy Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Elliot Health System (Manchester, NH) in Aug 2016
Interview Descriptions: first meet with HR for an interview then they send you down to meet with the laboratory supervisor. No worries, the lab supervisor doesnt asks you anything about how to draw blood and which tube to use.
Interview Questions:
what is your strengh and what is your weakness?
how would you deal with a conflic with another coworker?
a situation when you had to deal with a upseat client and how you dealed with this situation?

title: Linen Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Elliot Health System (Manchester, NH) in Mar 2011
Interview Descriptions: Interview process was professional. I met with the department manager. He did not make me feel uncomfortable. Once the interview was over he took me around for a quick tour of the location.
Interview Questions: How did you hear about the position?
